title: Bayesian Joint Spike-and-slab Graphical Lasso
text: goal spikeyglass implement method Bayesian Spike--Slab Joint Graphical Lasso (SSJGL) easy--use R package. Method paper: Li ZR, McCormick TH, Clark SJ. Bayesian Joint Spike--Slab Graphical Lasso. Proc Mach Learn Res. 2019 Jun;97:3877-3885. PMID: 33521648; PMCID: PMC7845917. Code based : https://github.com/richardli/SSJGL Acknowledgement code implement GGL FGL adapted R package JGL Patrick Danaher.

title: Simulated Network Data — simdat

title: Simulated Network Data — simdat
text: list 3 matrices 150 rows 50 columns: V1:V100 Data generated multivariate normal prespecified block structure 3 groups

title: ssjgl — ssjgl
code: ssjgl(   Y,   penalty = "fused",   lambda0,   lambda1,   lambda2,   v1 = 1,   v0s = seq(1e-04, 0.01, len = 10),   doubly = FALSE,   rho = 1,   a = 1,   b = 1,   maxitr.em = 500,   tol.em = 1e-04,   maxitr.jgl = 500,   tol.jgl = 1e-05,   warm = NULL,   warm.connected = NULL,   truncate = 1e-05,   normalize = FALSE,   c = 0.1,   impute = TRUE )

title: ssjgl — ssjgl
text: Y List k data matrices penalty Either "fused" "group" lambda0 scalar penalization diagonals lambda1 either constant matrix values search lambda2 either constant matrix values search v1 edgewise penalties v0s edgewise penalties doubly True False rho ? default 1 initializing parameters b initializing parameters maxitr.em max iterations EM algorithm. Default 500 tol.em default 1e-4 - ? sure means maxitr.jgl max iterations jgl. default 500 tol.jgl default 1e-4 - ? sure means warm ? warm.connected ? truncate cutoff truncate default 1e-5 normalize True False c constant. Default 0.1 impute true false
